aboutText:
I'm happy that I have the opportunity to live in the small town of Bad Driburg in North Rhine-Westphalia.

For more than ten years I have been working as a clothing designer, I also create homeliness using creative textiles of varying complexity.
aboutBottom3: with trendy design, impeccable tailoring and
pageTitle: Oksana Kuhn Design Studio | Sewing | Atelier | Textile [DISCOUNT for the first order]

main.coverTitle: Oksana Kuhn design studio with own atelier
main.leftText: I create designs for clothes and home textiles. I decorate interiors.
main.rightText: I develop a unique style that emphasizes individuality.

vorteileTitle: Why you should work with me
vor1Text: My experience allows me to solve problems of any complexity. From simple clothing repair to complex restoration of products.
vor2Text: In my atelier there are more than 50 types of different fabrics. From them, vou can choose the one that ideally matches your product and saves time on searches.
vor3Text: If you need it fast, no problem. I can do it in a couple of hours or in a few days. It all depends on the complexity of the work.
vor4Text: All orders are sewn individually in my atelier. lam personally responsible for the quality of tailoring and patterns.
vor5Text: I can pick up the fabric and calculate the cost of the order from the photo. Thus, saving your time.
portfolioContact: A competent choice is the key to success. Therefore, I will be happy to help you!
